nodes.text: The Khramboans were a diminutive species of blue-skinned, black-eyed sentients. Khramboan eyes were on the sides of horizontal eyestalks at the center of their egg-shaped heads, and their mouth was covered with tentacle-like appendages. Four holes were present at the center of their "forehead." Khramboans had also three-fingered stubby hands. Droogan, a vendor who operated on Coruscant, was a Khramboan, as was his grandfather.
